Description:
<0>GetPosition - retrieves the listener's position.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSound3DBuffer::GetPosition(
<3/><1>D3DVECTOR* <2>Position
<1>);
<2>Position - address of a D3DVECTOR structure that receives the listener's position vector.

<0>SetPosition - sets the listener's position.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSound3DBuffer::SetPosition(
<3/><1>D3DVALUE <2>X,
<3/><1>D3DVALUE <2>Y,
<3/><1>D3DVALUE <2>Z,
<3/><1>DWORD <2>Apply
<1>);
<2>X, Y, Z - new coordinates of the sound source. The subsystem can adjust the coordinates before installation if there is a risk of overflow during calculations.
